badges.name: Deadeye
badges.description: Jump shots taken with a defender closing out receive less of a penalty from a shot contest.

badges.name: Limitless Range
badges.description: Extends the range from which a player can shoot three-pointers effectively from deep.

badges.name: Mini Marksman
badges.description: Elevates the likelihood of making shots over taller defenders.

badges.name: Set Shot Specialist
badges.description: Boosts chances of knocking down stand-still jump shots.

badges.name: Shifty Shooter
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to successfully make off-the-dribble, high-difficulty jump shots.

badges.name: Aerial Wizard
badges.description: Increases the ability to finish an alley-oop from a teammate, or putback a finish off an offensive rebound.

badges.name: Float Game
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to make floaters.

badges.name: Hook Specialist
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to make post hooks.

badges.name: Layup Mixmaster
badges.description: improves a player's ability to finish fancy or acrobatic layups successfully.

badges.name: Paint Prodigy
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to quickly and efficiently score while going to work in the paint.

badges.name: Physical Finisher
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to battle through contact and convert contact layups.

badges.name: Post Fade Phenom
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to make post fades and hop shots.

badges.name: Post Powerhouse
badges.description: Strengthens a player's ability at backing down defenders and moving them with dropsteps.

badges.name: Post Up Poet
badges.description: Raises the chances of faking or getting by the defender, as well as scoring, when performing moves in the post.

badges.name: Posterizer
badges.description: Increases the chances of throwing down a dunk on your defender.

badges.name: Rise Up
badges.description: Increases the likelihood of dunking or posterizing your opponent when standing in the painted area.

badges.name: Ankle Assassin
badges.description: Increases the ability to break down the defender or cross them up.

badges.name: Bail Out
badges.description: Passing out of a jump shot or layup yields fewer errant passes than normal. Additionally, helps passing out of double teams.

badges.name: Break Starter
badges.description: After grabbing a defensive board, deep outlet passes made up the court are more accurate. Passes must be made quickly following the defensive rebound.

badges.name: Dimer
badges.description: When in the half-court, passes by Dimers to open shooters yield a shot percentage boost.

badges.name: Handles for Days
badges.description: A player takes less of an energy hit when performing consecutive dribble moves, allowing them to chain together combos quicker and for longer periods of time.

badges.name: Lightning Launch
badges.description: Speeds up launches when attacking from the perimeter.

badges.name: Strong Handle
badges.description: Reduces the likelihood of being bothered by defenders when dribbling.

badges.name: Unpluckable
badges.description: Defenders have a tougher time poking the ball free with their steal attempts.

badges.name: Versatile Visionary
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to thread and fit tight passes, including alley-oops, quickly and on time.

badges.name: Challenger
badges.description: Improves the effectiveness of well-timed contests against perimeter shooters.

badges.name: Glove
badges.description: Increases the ability to successfully steal from ball-handlers, or strip layup attempts.

badges.name: Interceptor
badges.description: The frequency of successfully tipped or intercepted passes greatly increases.

badges.name: High Flying Denier
badges.description: Boosts the speed and leaping ability of a defensive player in anticipation of a block attempt.

badges.name: Immovable Enforcer
badges.description: Improves a defensive player's strength when defending ball handlers and finishers.

badges.name: Off Ball Pest
badges.description: Makes players more difficult to get past when playing off-ball, as the can grab and hold their matchup and don't get their ankles broken as often.

badges.name: On-Ball Menace
badges.description: Hounds and bodies up while defending on the perimeter.

badges.name: Paint Patroller
badges.description: Increases a player's ability to block or contest shots at the rim.

badges.name: Pick Dodger
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to navigate through and around screens while on defense. At the Hall of Fame level, can blow through screens in the park or blacktop.

badges.name: Post Lockdown
badges.description: Strengthens a player's ability to effectively defend moves in the post, with an increased chance at stripping the opponent.

badges.name: Boxout Beast
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to box out and fight for good rebounding position.

badges.name: Rebound Chaser
badges.description: Improves a player's ability to track down rebounds from farther distances than normal.

badges.name: Brick Wall
badges.description: Increases the effectiveness of screens and drains energy from opponents on physical contact.

badges.name: Slippery Off Ball
badges.description: When attempting to get open off screens, the player more effectively navigates through traffic.

badges.name: Pogo Stick
badges.description: Allows players to quickly go back up for another jump upon landing. This could be after a rebound, block attempt, or even jumpshot.
